title: 09/15/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 09/15/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin shares what he thinks is actually a compliment to Baker Mayfield and the Browns even though people will try to make it sound like an insult. He explains why it’s time for the Bears to make a change at quarterback and make rookie Justin Fields their starter. He also shoots down the reports that Urban Meyer is considering a return to college football after only one game in the NFL. Plus, 2-time All Pro TE and NFL on FOX analyst Greg Olsen joins the show to talk about what he saw from Jets rookie QB Zach Wilson in his first NFL start.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
